nodes.text: Back the Imperial Forces was a propaganda poster by the Galactic Empire for the Imperial Military. It featured an Imperial officer to the left, a TIE fighter pilot in full uniform to the right, and a Stormtrooper behind them and standing in the center prominently, with the words "Back the Imperial Forces" in red High Galactic font.
This poster was first released on StarWars.com as part of an online promotional campaign for the Star Wars Rebels animated series in February 2014.
